ygData.subject: Re:  Data
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve long since given up using the psalms for damage shields.  It just doesn t end up being worthwhile, especially when you can be slowing them via chains
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 27 Dec 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:

> Is my rationale on song selection on track or am I missing out on something?

I've long since given up using the psalms for damage shields. It just
doesn't end up being worthwhile, especially when you can be slowing them
via chains or binding instead (given no enchanter or shaman).

When in an area with casters, I will tend toward Guardian and Elemental
Rhythms with drum. The psalms don't stack with anything
resistance-related, and I love how people oggle when their MR jumps 100
points.

I could be using weapons and a psalm, but my philosophy is if the caster
is barely scratching us anyway, it doesn't matter if it takes a few more
seconds to kill it.

Against spiders in lower guk, I did use the psalm of purity a fair bit.

Athren
